value:
Commander Anna seems to be a fine
instructor. My methods are different,
but I believe we will get along well.

I served as a teacher to Roy and
Lilina, two of my favorite students.
Both were such adorable pupils.

Serving as a tactician here must be
quite taxing. If ever a cup of tea would
help, I would like to join you.

You are the tactician in battle. And I,
yours to deploy. Our friendship must
never disrupt that chain of command.

Though I have taught the art of battle
to others, like Roy, I would love to
learn all that you can teach me.

How do you do? I take it that you
are $Nu?$k$pI am Cecilia, come to greet you.

How very nice to attain such
remarkable gains!
Any improvement is welcome.

I may have to relinquish my title
at this rate.

You chose to bestow this on me.
I will live up to your expectations.

I am Cecilia, the Mage General of
Etruria. Are you the tactician here?
Pleased to meet you.

When I first met you, my intention
was to teach you, much as I did
my pupils Roy and Lilina.$k$pBut then I saw how quickly you grew
in your role here, to the extent that
you surpassed even me.$k$pIt's the bittersweet moment that
every teacher goes through, to see
those around her learn to soar.$k$pThat is the moment when she
feels left behind...$k$pWhat? You still need me? It's a
relief to hear you say that. Perhaps
I have more still to teach.$k$pWell, then it's settled. I will be
staying here after all!
はっ！
はぁっ！
きゃああっ！
I let my guard down...
Here and now!
Never underestimate me!
Keep your distance or perish!
My chance is at hand!
The light...
Heehee
How fare you, tactician?
Now, now... No need to nudge me. You have my attention.
I sense a great deal of talent in you. You're a natural.
Shall we discuss battle strategy?
Should you wish to know anything at all, simply ask!
I will ever do my best to fulfill my role.
You have much to teach, and even I have much to learn.
Mm-hmm?
Yes?
Your orders.
